Author: bravado105
Text: I did it just a couple of weeks ago. I kind of just blurted it out and they were really taken aback by it but supportive. They basically asked me what I wanted to do about it (like therapy or pills or whatever) and asked me to explain what's been going on. They asked me how much I've been eating, what I weigh, etc. I would be prepared for them being surprised and asking questions and making some insensitive/triggering comments.   I am so proud of you for taking this step. You can do it, even if you feel like it's impossible. I kept putting it off until one night I forced myself to do it. You are so capable and this is a really brave thing to do. Wishing you the best x
